institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: National Human Resources Development Consortium Operating Rules/Article 20 (Use of Labor Costs)
contents: Article 20 (Use of Labor Costs) ① The joint training center must use the labor costs (hereinafter referred to as *labor costs) subsidized by the subsidy as the labor costs of dedicated personnel pursuant to Article 16 of the Regulations, including the following cases. 1. Salary applied to all workers within the joint training center, 2. Salary such as special bonuses stipulated to be paid in the employment contract concluded between the joint training center and the person in charge, 3. Retirement for payment of severance pay to the person in charge. Accumulation of salary reserves, ② Notwithstanding paragraph 1, the joint training center may not use the costs that the joint training center must bear among social insurance premiums (national pension, health insurance, employment insurance, industrial accident compensation insurance) as labor costs. ③ The details of labor costs used by the joint training center are calculated based on the total amount paid directly to the person in charge during the business fiscal year. However, if the fiscal year is different from the government fiscal year, it is calculated from the monthly wage ledger, etc.
